name: CannonBall! 3D Ball Dodging Game - Android
description:
Here is a game we have created for android, its called CannonBall! you play as a simple cube dodging all of the balls trying to get lots of points.

we created this game to go against "Hyper Casual Games"(HCG) these types of games are simple games made in a week and display a lot of ads. in our game there are 0 ads. the most known companies for HCG are Voodoo, Ketchapp and many more.

download our game and have fun "AD FREE"

we have worked hard on this game and it would be nice if you could download it and play it and maybe leave a review. note: right now it's only available for android if it's popular enough we will add it to IOS devices.

you can find the games link below.

Thanks.
